room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Escape" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: You cocky sons of bitches did it again! We had an amazing time venturing your horrible, yet amazing, experience. I thought the service was great but at the same time, slow and uncultured! Our game host, Tracy Turnplat, was a mean witch who we dearly loved! Would never come back but would recommend it to a friend! Thanks for my feedback. 5? Stars

room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Escape" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: Was a complete blast, had so much fun hunting around in the dark for clues with a group of my friends. Filled with fun and laughter, and have to say we had the best game master Sarah D, in Florence.

room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Escape" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: Did the Fraveyard, it's was awesome. Group of 6 and we had a blast. Definitely going back. Madeline was awesome as well!

room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Escape" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: I did the Graveyard escape and it was so fun! Emilee was our game master and she was great. She helped us without giving us too much info.

room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Escape" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: First time doing one of these. The graveyard was a lot of fun. Staff were excellent and kept the game moving for us.

room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Escape" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: We had a ball trying to escape the Graveyard and we conquered the room! Lamont and Cameron were super cool with showing us the ropes and giving us a few clues. Definitely would like to return and try our luck again in another escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Graveyard Escape" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: We had an 8 person group date on Saturday and chose the Graveyard Escape room. The workers did a great job explaining everything that we needed to know before we even entered the room. Our guide Cameron did a great job giving clues and making us laugh! The 8 of us had a great time and can't wait to return to try some of the harder rooms.
